name: beatcode
description:
WARNING: "Campaign" and "Options" do not work as intended, please only use the "Freeplay" option in the menu.

beatcode

A game prototype where you code to the beat! Made for HaxeJam 2022: Summer Jam

CONTROLS

In menus, arrow keys, enter and esc is used.

In game, any key (except for Escape) is used to hit notes on the rhythm (to make it seem like typing). Escape opens up the pause menu.
